description_part1: Get a backup solution with daily automatic remote backups, proactive alerts, and centralized monitoring, all securely stored in a Vault on OVHcloud Object Storage. Install the backup agent in under 15 minutes, at no cost. You only pay for the Object Storage that you use.
description_part2: Follow our guides to get started quickly.

guide1.title: Cost and Billing
guide1.description: Documentation explaining the cost and billing of Backup Agent.

guide2.title: Initial setup
guide2.description: A step-by-step guide to help you set up and run your first backup.

guide3.title: Frequently asked questions
guide3.description: A guide with frequently asked questions addressing the most common issues.

no_baremetal_available: Order a Bare Metal server, and protect it with Backup Agent
baremetal_label_delay_order: After your order is validated, this screen will be updated and you will receive an email as soon as your Backup Agent product is delivered. You can check the progress of your order <OrderLink>here</OrderLink>.
baremetal_label_order_in_progress: The order has been received, your product is being delivered and you can track its progress <OrderLink>here</OrderLink>.
first_order_terms_and_conditions_descrip: To activate your service, it is necessary to create a Backup Tenant. Do you wish to continue the activation of your service?
first_order_terms_and_conditions_confirm: I have read and accept the terms and conditions, the appendix relating to the processing of personal data and the special terms and conditions of OVH services.
first_order_terms_and_conditions_annexe_: Annex on the Processing of Personal Data
